page.title: 07MY HOUSE IN NORWICH
page.content: { My house was built in 1910 it has seven rooms,three bedrooms,a sitting room,dining room,kitchen and a bathroom .Most of the houses are terraced.My dad built a garage and a bathroom.In our front door there are stained glass windows,but they are very loose from people slamming the door.Our garden is quite small due to our garage.We have two cars.We used to have a coal fire but now we have a gas fire because we have had central heating installed.I live on Glebe Road which is just off Unthank Road.To get to our back door we have an alley which leads to all of the houses,it is open to cars as well.
